SponsorshipCertificateForm.title: Sponsorship Certificate for External Ph.D. Registration
SponsorshipCertificateForm.addressee: The Director, National Institute of Technology, Agartala
SponsorshipCertificateForm.subject: Sponsorship of Employee for External Ph.D. Programme Registration
SponsorshipCertificateForm.purposeStatement: To sponsor an employee of an organization for admission to the Ph.D. programme at NIT Agartala under the External Registration scheme.

formFields.notes: Please enclose the bio-data of each local supervisor, including their designation, qualifications, research experience with area of research, and a statement of their consent for research guidance.

certifications: It is certified that the applicant has completed a minimum of two (2) years of regular service in our organization/institute.
If the applicant is admitted to the Ph.D. programme, we agree to relieve him/her to attend required classes at NIT Agartala for completion of the Ph.D. programme coursework.
The applicant will be permitted to conduct research towards the Ph.D. degree at our organization under the guidance of the selected local supervisor.
We will provide the necessary facilities to support this research.
SponsorshipCertificateForm.signatureRequirement: Signature and Seal of the Sponsoring Authority
